overview: Ismail and Abdel Fattah are working in a shop selling antiquities, bringing a box with one of the mummies, watched by a man who claims to be an archaeologist and that he is able to revive the mummy. He has a niece who is engaged to one of the doctors. This man mocks him to get him into the mummy. Ismail is the victim, and events escalate.
title: حرام عليك
